## CreateHooksFn type

Represents the function used to define hooks and related configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CreateHooksFn<CSSProperties> = <S extends Selector>(...selectors: S[]) => CreateHooksResult<S, CSSProperties>;
```
